name: Feature Request
about: Suggest a new skill or enhancement
title: '[FEATURE] '
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Feature Type
- [ ] New Skill
- [ ] Skill Enhancement
- [ ] Documentation Improvement
- [ ] Other

## Description
A clear and concise description of the feature or skill you'd like to see.

## Use Case
Why would this be valuable? What problem does it solve?

## Proposed Structure (for new skills)
If suggesting a new skill, what categories/topics would it cover?

## Examples
Provide examples or reference materials if available.

## Additional Context
Any other information that would be helpful.
